artefact: Update your approved driving instructor (ADI) registration

artefact.overview: Update your personal details on the approved driving instructor (ADI) register if they have changed
artefact.more_information:
The online service is available from 6am to 11:30pm.

You will need your:

- online user ID from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
- password

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

^There's a different process to [update your ADI registration](http://www.dvtani.gov.uk/adi/adiregistration.asp "Update your ADI registration"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland.^
artefact.introduction:
Update your personal details for your approved driving instructor (ADI) registration. You can also agree to keep your professional skills up to date, read the voluntary ADI code of practice, and view your check test history.

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
artefact.alternate_methods:
##Update by email or phone

You can update your details by sending an email or calling the DSA. You’ll need to give your ADI personal reference number.

$C
**DSA helpline**
  
0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday 8am to 6pm  
<adireg@dsa.gsi.gov.uk>  
$C

##Update by post

Send a letter to the DSA to update your details by post. You’ll need to include your ADI personal reference number.

$A
Register of Approved Driving Instructors
Driving Standards Agency
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP
$A

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
